completion: python3 -c "import csv,  json,  sys; data=list(csv.DictReader(open(sys.argv[1]))); json.dump(data,  open(sys.argv[2],  'w'),  indent=2)" input.csv output.json
python3 -c "import csv,  Json,  sys; data=json.load(open(sys.argv[1])); w=csv.DictWriter(open(sys.argv[2],  'w'),  data[0].keys()); w.writeheader(); w.writerows(data)" input.json output.csv
python3 -c "import yaml,  json,  sys; data=yaml.safe_load(open(sys.argv[1])); json.dump(data,  open(sys.argv[2],  'w'),  indent=2)" input.yaml output.json
python3 -c "import yaml,  json,  sys; data=json.load(open(sys.argv[1])); yaml.dump(data,  open(sys.argv[2],   'w'),  default_flow_style=False)" input.json output.yaml
python3 -c "import xmltodict,  json,  sys; with open(sys.argv[1]) as f: data=xmltodict.parse(f.read()); json.dump(data,  open(sys.argv[2],  'w'),  indent=2)" input.xml output.json
python3 -c "import xmltodict,  json,  sys; data=json.load(open(sys.argv[1])); with open(sys.argv[2,  'w') as f: f.write(xmltodict.unparse(data,  pretty=True))" input.json output.xml

[Interface]
Address = 10.0.0.1/24
ListenPort = 51820
PrivateKey = $(sudo cat /etc/wireguard/private.key)

PublicKey = client_public_key_here

EOF

completion:

EOF

ch: 安装 Loki 日志聚合
ja: Lokiログ集約のインストール

completion:
cat > /etc/loki/loki.yml << 'EOF'
auth_enabled: false

server:
  http_listen_port: 3100

ingester:
  lifecycler:
    address: 127.0.0.1
    ring:
      kvstore:
        store: inmemory
      replication_factor: 1
    final_sleep: 0s
  chunk_idle_period: 5m
  chunk_retain_period: 30s

schema_config:
  configs:
    - from: 2020-10-24
      store: boltdb-shipper
      object_store: filesystem
      schema: v11
      index:
        prefix: index_
        period: 24h

storage_config:
  boltdb_shipper:
    active_index_directory: /tmp/loki/boltdb-shipper-active
    cache_location: /tmp/loki/boltdb-shipper-cache
    shared_store: filesystem
  filesystem:
    directory: /tmp/loki/chunks

limits_config:
  enforce_metric_name: false
  reject_old_samples: true
  reject_old_samples_max_age: 168h

chunk_store_config:
  max_look_back_period: 0s

table_manager:
  retention_deletes_enabled: false
  retention_period: 0s
EOF

ch: 安装 Promtail 日志收集器
fr: Installer le collecteur de logs Promtail
ja: Promtailログコレクターのインストール

completion:
cat > /etc/promtail/promtail.yml << 'EOF'
server:
  http_listen_port: 9080
  grpc_listen_port: 0

positions:
  filename: /tmp/positions.yaml

clients:
  - url: http://localhost:3100/loki/api/v1/push

scrape_configs:
- job_name: system
  static_configs:
  - targets:
      - localhost
    labels:
      job: varlogs
      __path__: /var/log/*log
EOF

ch: 安装 Node Exporter 用于指标导出
fr: Installer Node Exporter pour les métriques
ja: メトリクス用Node Exporterのインストール

completion:
cat > /etc/blackbox_exporter/config.yml << 'EOF'
modules:
  http_2xx:
    prober: http
    timeout: 5s
    http:
      valid_status_codes: []
      method: GET
EOF

ch: 安装 Alertmanager 用于事件管理告警
ja: アラート用Alertmanagerのインストール

completion:
cat > /etc/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml << 'EOF'
route:
  group_by: ['alertname']
  group_wait: 10s
  group_interval: 10s
  repeat_interval: 1h
  receiver: 'web.hook'
receivers:
- name: 'web.hook'
  webhook_configs:
  - url: 'http://127.0.0.1:5001/'
inhibit_rules:
  - source_match:
      severity: 'critical'
    target_match:
      severity: 'warning'
    equal: ['alertname', 'dev', 'instance']
EOF

ch: 安装 Telegraf 指标收集器
fr: Installer le collecteur de métriques Telegraf
ja: Telegrafメトリクスコレクターのインストール

completion:
cat > /etc/telegraf/telegraf.conf << 'EOF'

[agent]
  interval = "10s
  round_interval = true
  metric_batch_size = 1000
  metric_buffer_limit = 10000
  collection_jitter = "0s"
  flush_interval = "10s"
  flush_jitter = "0s"
  precision = ""
  hostname = ""
  omit_hostname = false

[[outputs.influxdb]]
  urls = ["http://localhost:8086"]
  database = "telegraf"
  timeout = "5s"

[[inputs.cpu]]
  percpu = true
  totalcpu = true
  collect_cpu_time = false
  report_active = false

[[inputs.mem]]
[[inputs.disk]]
[[inputs.diskio]]
[[inputs.net]]
[[inputs.processes]]
[[inputs.system]]
EOF
